meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stereospecific.
meanings.sent1: The stereospecificities of this enzyme ensure it only reacts with one specific molecule.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the stereospecificities of chemical reactions to understand how molecules interact.
meanings.sent3: The party was so organized, it had a stereospecificities that impressed everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves had a stereospecificities that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The artist's attention to detail showed a stereospecificities in every brushstroke.

meanings.definition: The property of a reaction or process that is dependent on the stereochemistry of the reactants.
meanings.sent1: The stereospecificities of the reaction determined the outcome of the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Chemists need to consider the stereospecificities of the molecules when designing new drugs.
meanings.sent3: The stereospecificities of the baking process led to a delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: The success of the project relied on the stereospecificities of the team members.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the stereospecificities of the system is crucial for its proper functioning.
